name: Healthyfied Pepper Chicken With Vegetables
description: This Healthyfied Pepper Chicken With Vegetables recipe embodies a delectable blend of high-protein and low-carb ingredients, making it perfect for a nutritious meal. Enjoy the savory taste of tender chicken breast paired with an array of vegetables, all seasoned with a hint of black pepper for that extra kick. A low-sugar delight that stays true to healthy eating.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the mixed vegetables according to the package instructions (if frozen) or wash and chop fresh vegetables into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cooked chicken breast into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, melt the unsalted butter over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the prepared vegetables to the pan and saut√© for about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Introduce the chicken pieces to the pan and sprinkle the ground black pepper over the chicken and vegetables. Stir well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the mixture for an additional 10 minutes, until the vegetables are soft and the chicken is heated through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
